text: The High Judicial and Prosecutorial Council of Bosnia and Herzegovina is a national institution responsible for many aspects of the judicial system Bosnia and Herzegovina. It appoints, trains, and disciplines judges, prosecutors in The Prosecutor Office of Bosnia and Herzegovina in and is responsible for advising other levels of government about judicial budgets and administration. ==External links== * Official site of the HJPC Category:Bosnia and Herzegovina law
title: High Judicial and Prosecutorial Council
